ruleToc.chapterUrl:
<js>
var nid = baseUrl.match(/nid=.*/)[0].replace("nid=","")
var ids = "{{$.id}}"
var url = "https://api1.gongzicp.com/apiv2/novel/getNovelChapterContents?nid="+nid+"&chapter_ids="+ids

</js>
